Topic.Title: [SITE BUG??] I can't seem to make my game Public....

Posts.EditableText:
So, I went to publish my game, and clicked "Everybody", but it posted the game Unlisted. I've gone back and clicked "Everybody" again, and again, and again..... but it keeps doing the same thing.
Is this a bug?
I've tried multiple browsers and computers and mobile, but I keep getting the same result...
Here's The Link to The Offending game: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/zafjoeffkessjg9ot9drsw/sister-location-the-text-adventure-beta

[[PROBLEM SOLVED]]
Also: New Link ^^^^

Posts.EditableText:
Your first game I assume?
I don't think it is a bug.
I think the moderators just want time to check it out first to make sure there are no "bugs" and such...
My first game did that and took the longest before it was made public.

I think there is an overall problem right now.

Every time I try to upload my file, which is working fine in Quest, I get "The resource you are looking for has been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable."

Tried a new browser, tried to create a new/different account and get an "e-mail verification failed" error there.

Seems like the site is very buggy right now.
